tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got my lower right wisdom tooth extracted at Dr. Amar and Dr. Swati Ravjiani's dental clinic a week ago and found the overall process to be smooth and seamless. I was thoroughly guided about the procedure and the after care measures which helped in quick healing.  Overall, I am very much satisfied with the entire process and have zero complaints.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
Extremely friendly Doctor team who patiently explained the entire procedure before beginning the same and constantly kept telling me at what stage we were at.  ******** ******* ***** **** ensured minimal pain (Dental pain is not zero- let no one tell you otherwise) and very patient reassurances during the entire procedure

During the pandemic times, this place is highly recommended for the sheer precautionary measures they follow, and the strong hygiene rules, that ensures safety for all. 

The cost is well worth the entire procedure and I would most definitely recommend this clinic JAWS-N-JOINTS  at Ghatkopar; without any hesitation. It is definitely worth yr travel time from wherever you are based out of in Mumbai.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Ravjiani is a thorough professional. He knows what he is doing and explains the issue well. He takes extra care of his patients and I feel secure in his treatment.  I have been visiting him for over 20 years now, though I left Mumbai a while ago I travel to his clinic for treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I always feared to visit a dental clinic but thanks to my wife who convinced me to visit Dr Swati.
Once Dr Amar and there colleague explained me the entire process and the effects of benefits getting the treatment I was confident that I am in safe hands.
Thanks to Dr Amar and Dr Swati and team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor communicated every detail with me before, through and after the procedure. The extraction itself was very smooth and was quickly over. I received much need morale and professional support throughout the procedure. Many thanks to the doctor and everyone involved.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: she explained me every thing before treatment., and also when she was giving treatment.After few days she will fix cap.Even Dr.Amar was there to tk exact measurement..v.much satisfied with the treatment..Ambiace also is v good..cleanniess is also good..no waiting time..all v good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor explained to me about my problem and what was the best treatment for that. There was no waiting during all the visits. I had fear that the root canal and the crown treatment would be very painful,  but to my surprise it was a painless treatment. The doctor was very friendly and it was overall a very pleasant experience.
